# Environment = mssparkutils.env.getWorkspaceName()
# if 'prod' in Environment:
#     StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
#     StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
#     StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
# else:
#     StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorage'
#     StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
#     StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorage'

# # ' + StorageAccount + '

# #Create DataFrame for the sttransactionssummary SAP Table
# sttransactionssummary = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/FINANCE/sttransactionssummary.parquet', format='parquet')
# sttransactionssummary.createOrReplaceTempView("sttransactionssummary")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stdocumentcategories
AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
   t.sap_transactionsline_doccat 
  ,CASE 
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'generaljournal' THEN 'General Journal'
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'manualjournal' THEN 'Manual Journal'
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'purchaseorder' THEN 'Purchase Order'
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'purchaseinvoice' THEN 'Purchase Invoice'
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'goodsissue' THEN 'Goods Issue'
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'salesinvoice' THEN 'Sales Invoice'
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'salescredit' THEN 'Sales Credit'
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'directposting' THEN 'Direct Posting'
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'purchasepricevariance' THEN 'Purchase Price Variance'
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'goodsreceiptnote' THEN 'Goods Receipt Note'
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'goodsreceipt' THEN 'Goods Receipt'
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'stockrevaluation' THEN 'Stock Revaluation'
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'purchasecredit' THEN 'Purchase Credit'
      WHEN t.sap_transactionsline_doccat  = 'discountjournal' THEN 'Discount Journal'
		  ELSE NULL
	END as sap_transactionsline_doccatname

FROM sttransactionssummary t
ORDER BY t.sap_transactionsline_doccat
